aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a key that is present in the request the user makes to the SageMaker service

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair

aws:SourceIp.description: Filters access by the requestor's IP address

aws:SourceVpc.description: Filters access by the requestor's VPC

aws:SourceVpce.description: Filters access by on requestor's VPC endpoint

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the list of all the tag key names associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:AcceleratorTypes.description: Filters access by the list of all accelerator types associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:AppNetworkAccessType.description: Filters access by the app network access type associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:DirectInternetAccess.description: Filters access by the direct internet access associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:DomainSharingOutputKmsKey.description: Filters access by the Domain sharing output KMS key associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:FeatureGroupOfflineStoreKmsKey.description: Filters access by the offline store kms key associated with the feature group resource in the request

sagemaker:FeatureGroupOfflineStoreS3Uri.description: Filters access by the offline store s3 uri associated with the feature group resource in the request

sagemaker:FeatureGroupOnlineStoreKmsKey.description: Filters access by the online store kms key associated with the feature group resource in the request

sagemaker:FileSystemAccessMode.description: Filters access by a file system access mode associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:FileSystemDirectoryPath.description: Filters access by a file system directory path associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:FileSystemId.description: Filters access by a file system ID associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:FileSystemType.description: Filters access by a file system type associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:HomeEfsFileSystemKmsKey.description: Filters access by a key that is present in the request the user makes to the SageMaker service. This key is deprecated. It has been replaced by sagemaker:VolumeKmsKey

sagemaker:ImageArns.description: Filters access by the list of all image arns associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:ImageVersionArns.description: Filters access by the list of all image version arns associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:InstanceTypes.description: Filters access by the list of all instance types associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:InterContainerTrafficEncryptio.description: Filters access by the inter container traffic encryption associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:MaxRuntimeInSeconds.description: Filters access by the max runtime in seconds associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:ModelApprovalStatus.description: Filters access by the model approval status with the model-package in the request

sagemaker:ModelArn.description: Filters access by the model arn associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:NetworkIsolation.description: Filters access by the network isolation associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:OutputKmsKey.description: Filters access by the output kms key associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:ResourceTag/.description: Filters access by the preface string for a tag key and value pair attached to a resource

sagemaker:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair

sagemaker:RootAccess.description: Filters access by the root access associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:TargetModel.description: Filters access by the target model associated with the Multi-Model Endpoint in the request

sagemaker:VolumeKmsKey.description: Filters access by the volume kms key associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:VpcSecurityGroupIds.description: Filters access by the list of all VPC security group ids associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:VpcSubnets.description: Filters access by the list of all VPC subnets associated with the resource in the request

sagemaker:WorkteamArn.description: Filters access by the workteam arn associated to the request

sagemaker:WorkteamType.description: Filters access by the workteam type associated to the request. This can be public-crowd, private-crowd or vendor-crowd
